title: Firehouse Lawyer December 2019
summary: The newsletter covers key legal updates including employment law cases, public records act changes, emergency services regulations, and public duty doctrine developments.
compressed_content: Notable employment law case analysis and regulatory updates. Important changes to the Public Records Act and their implications. Updates on emergency services regulations and evacuation drills. Significant developments in public duty doctrine and employment law.
search_text: Volume 17, Number 12. Legal content includes case analyses such as Eric Quinnett's review of employment laws, statute changes like RCW 39.34.030, emergency services updates on evacuation drills, and public duty developments in the context of police overtime.
